column4: I am using the repos setup by synaptic and I have tried both the australian repos and the 'main' ones.
what was the package thats having trouble again?
gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly
when installing wine it also installs gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly which gives the error "files list file for package `gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly' contains empty filename"
did you try "sudo apt-get install gstream0.10-plugins-ugly"
yes a couple of times, I also deleted the apt cache file, to get it to download it again, it just doesn't want to work :(
mind if I send it to you?
nope, my email is nrdb01 at butterflystitches dot com dot au
how did you do that, it appeared to start the transfer but stoped ???
it finished, you have the file
yes, the terminal was in the wrong directory thanks, how did you do that ?
I right clicked on your name and selected "send file"
it doesn't work, do you want the output of 'sudo dpkg --install ....' ?
yes i do =)
but if its too long, use pastebin
try installing it with a --force-all flag
no complaints from dpkg, but when I went to install wine again it said it was doing 1 upgrade and 1 install, and failed on the gstreamer again :(
argh...  give me the full output at www.pastebin.com
see http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/18813/
i donno... worked for me, locale settings maybe?
as this is quite a new install I might just reinstall fiesty, is there any way to get the install not to change the hdd rdb block ?
that is not do the grub stuff
not that I know of, the alternative install CD might give you more options there though
ok, thanks for the help, I leaned a couple of things.
